data.name: Cerebrum Operation
data.detailed_description:
The government completely collapsed. The entire city has been turned into a vast daunting battlefield where small teams of private contractors are trying to gain back control over the city.

In this tactical turn-based game, start at the heart of the city, focus on the main outposts and useful locations to upgrade your teams. Your decisions alone can lead to victory in this war-torn area. Build and improve camps and outposts, upgrade your squads and fight to conquer the other faction's territories. But make sure that your men remain within reach of supplies and get the best weapons and equipment available, from the handy tactical knife to the powerful tank.

Remember that victory will be within your grasp in the long run. Maybe your enemy is falling behind only to better surround you and harrass you. Be smart, fight back and get the enemy to surrender.

FEATURES


  • Create and manage your own squads. Fully customize your soldiers with unique looks, personal skills and individual equipment that best suit your strategy. 
  • Use the wide diversity of weapons at your disposal to win massive tactical fights.
  • Manage multiple squads and take control of a large and complex map.
  • Play on one map only, without loading time nor transition screen
  • Each and every decision you take matters. From the supplies network you will establish to the tactical choices you will make in terms of progression and combat.
  • Each soldier and vehicle can level up, veteran units are hard to get and maintain but they can be a powerful asset for you.
  • Build camps and outposts to help your squads take control of the world and make Operation Cerebrum a success.
  • Create and managed your own squads. Custom your solider gear, improve their tactics and enhance their abilities.

data.short_description: Make wise decisions in this turn-based tactical game in a world at war. Upgrade your squads with new equipment and skills. Build camps and outposts to ensure your soldiers never run out of supplies. Will you survive and conquer the whole city ? Only you can make the difference in Cerebrum Operation!

English*, French

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10, 8 and 7 SP1+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 3.1 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 / AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10, 8 and 7 SP1+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 3.1 GHz or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
